languages.text: "Вынуждена сообщить вам, что ваши методы выслеживания повстанцев {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}обескровили{/d} производственные комплексы. Среди погибших были не только старики и дети, но и бесценные специалисты, которые унесли тайны своей профессии в могилу. Боюсь, все, на что можно рассчитывать в ближайшие годы — это имперские подати и минимальные поставки вашим важнейшим мирам".

"I must inform you that your methods of tracking down the rebels have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}drained{/d} our production facilities of workers. Those lost include not only the elderly and children, but also priceless experts who have now carried the secrets of their profession to the grave. I fear that all you can expect in the coming years are Imperial tithes and minimal provisions for your most important worlds."
languages.original_text: "Вынуждена сообщить вам, что ваши методы выслеживания повстанцев {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}обескровили{/d} производственные комплексы. Среди погибших были не только старики и дети, но и бесценные специалисты, которые унесли тайны своей профессии в могилу. Боюсь, все, на что можно рассчитывать в ближайшие годы — это имперские подати и минимальные поставки вашим важнейшим мирам".

traits.locale_text: "I must inform you that your methods of tracking down the rebels have drained our production facilities of workers. Thоse lost include not only the elderly and children, but also priceless experts who have now carried the secrets of their profession to the grave. I fear that all you can expect in the coming years are Imperial tithes and minimal provisions for your most important worlds."

I fear that all you can expect in the coming years are Imperial tithes and minimal provisions for your most important worlds."

languages.text: “我不得不告知您，您追踪叛军的手段，让我们生产设施中的工人{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}损耗殆尽{/d}。那些损失的人手不仅仅包括老人和孩子，还包括无比重要的专家。如今，那些人的职业技能被他们带进了坟墓里。我担心，在未来的几年里，我们恐怕只能按时缴纳帝国什一税，对您最重要的世界提供最低限度的供给。”
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that your methods of tracking down the rebels have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}drained{/d} our production facilities of workers. Those lost include not only the elderly and children, but also priceless experts who have now carried the secrets of their profession to the grave. I fear that all you can expect in the coming years are Imperial tithes and minimal provisions for your most important worlds."

traits.locale_text: “我不得不告知您，您追踪叛军的手段，让我们生产设施中的工人损耗殆尽。那些损失的人手不仅仅包括老人和孩子，还包括无比重要的专家。如今，那些人的职业技能被他们带进了坟墓里。我担心，在未来的几年里，我们恐怕只能按时缴纳帝国什一税，对您最重要的世界提供最低限度的供给。”

languages.text: «Debo informarle de que sus métodos de encontrar a los rebeldes han {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}dejado{/d} las instalaciones de producción casi sin personal. Entre las bajas no solo hay ancianos y niños, sino también expertos de un valor incalculable que se han llevado los secretos de su profesión a la tumba. Lamento que en los años venideros solo podremos proporcionar el Diezmo Imperial y provisiones mínimas para los mundos más esenciales».
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that your methods of tracking down the rebels have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}drained{/d} our production facilities of workers. Those lost include not only the elderly and children, but also priceless experts who have now carried the secrets of their profession to the grave. I fear that all you can expect in the coming years are Imperial tithes and minimal provisions for your most important worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Debo informarle de que sus métodos de encontrar a los rebeldes han dejado las instalaciones de producción casi sin personal. Entre las bajas no solo hay ancianos y niños, sino también expertos de un valor incalculable que se han llevado los secretos de su profesión a la tumba. Lamento que en los años venideros solo podremos proporcionar el Diezmo Imperial y provisiones mínimas para los mundos más esenciales».

languages.text: 「陛下が反乱軍を追跡した手法のために、労働者という農業設備が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}失われている{/d}ことをお伝えせねばなりません。こうした損失は高齢者と子供のみならず貴重な専門家をも含んでいたため、専門的職業の秘伝が墓場に行ってしまったのです。恐れながら、今後数年間は帝国租税と最重要惑星向けの最小限の食糧しか期待できません」
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that your methods of tracking down the rebels have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}drained{/d} our production facilities of workers. Those lost include not only the elderly and children, but also priceless experts who have now carried the secrets of their profession to the grave. I fear that all you can expect in the coming years are Imperial tithes and minimal provisions for your most important worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下が反乱軍を追跡した手法のために、労働者という農業設備が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}失われている{/d}ことをお伝えせねばなりません。こうした損失は高齢者と子供のみならず貴重な専門家をも含んでいたため、専門的職業の秘伝が墓場に行ってしまったのです。恐れながら、今後数年間は帝国租税と最重要惑星向けの最小限の食糧しか期待できません」

languages.text: "Ich muss Euch informieren, dass Eure Methode, die Rebellen aufzuspüren, zu einem {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}Mangel an Arbeitern{/d} in den Produktionsstätten geführt hat. Wir haben nicht nur Alte und Kinder verloren, sondern auch unbezahlbare Fachleute, die nun ihre Berufsgeheimnisse mit ins Grab genommen haben. Ich fürchte, Ihr könnt in den nächsten Jahren nur den imperialen Zehnt und minimale Vorräte für Eure wichtigsten Welten erwarten."
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that your methods of tracking down the rebels have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}drained{/d} our production facilities of workers. Those lost include not only the elderly and children, but also priceless experts who have now carried the secrets of their profession to the grave. I fear that all you can expect in the coming years are Imperial tithes and minimal provisions for your most important worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss Euch informieren, dass Eure Methode, die Rebellen aufzuspüren, zu einem Arbeitermangel in den Produktionsstätten geführt hat. Wir haben nicht nur Alte und Kinder verloren, sondern auch unbezahlbare Fachleute, die nun ihre Berufsgeheimnisse mit ins Grab genommen haben. Ich fürchte, Ihr könnt in den nächsten Jahren nur den imperialen Zehnt und minimale Vorräte für Eure wichtigsten Welten erwarten."

languages.text: « Je dois vous informer que les méthodes que vous avez employées pour traquer les rebelles ont {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}décimé{/d} la main-d'œuvre de nos complexes de production. Parmi les victimes, nous comptons non seulement des personnes âgées et des enfants, mais aussi des experts irremplaçables qui ont emporté les secrets de leur profession dans la tombe. Malheureusement, Janus ne sera pas capable de faire plus que de s'acquitter des taxes impériales et de fournir de petites quantités de provisions à vos mondes les plus importants dans les années à venir. »
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that your methods of tracking down the rebels have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}drained{/d} our production facilities of workers. Those lost include not only the elderly and children, but also priceless experts who have now carried the secrets of their profession to the grave. I fear that all you can expect in the coming years are Imperial tithes and minimal provisions for your most important worlds."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois vous informer que les méthodes que vous avez employées pour traquer les rebelles ont décimé la main-d'œuvre de nos complexes de production. Parmi les victimes, nous comptons non seulement des personnes âgées et des enfants, mais aussi des experts irremplaçables qui ont emporté les secrets de leur profession dans la tombe. Malheureusement, Janus ne sera pas capable de faire plus que de s'acquitter des taxes impériales et de fournir petites quantités de provisions à vos mondes les plus importants dans les années à venir. »

languages.text: "İsyancıların izini sürerken kullandığınız yöntemden dolayı üretim tesislerimizde işçi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}kalmadığını{/d} belirtmeliyim. Ölenler arasında yalnızca yaşlılarla çocuklar değil, aynı zamanda mesleki sırlarını mezara götüren paha biçilmez uzmanlar da var. Korkarım ki önümüzdeki yıllarda bir tek İmparatorluk aşarları ile elzem dünyalarınız için asgari erzak sunabileceğiz."
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that your methods of tracking down the rebels have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}drained{/d} our production facilities of workers. Those lost include not only the elderly and children, but also priceless experts who have now carried the secrets of their profession to the grave. I fear that all you can expect in the coming years are Imperial tithes and minimal provisions for your most important worlds."

traits.locale_text: "İsyancıların izini sürerken kullandığınız yöntemden dolayı üretim tesislerimizde işçi kalmadığını belirtmeliyim. Ölenler arasında yalnızca yaşlılarla çocuklar değil, aynı zamanda mesleki sırlarını mezara taşıyan paha biçilmez uzmanlar da var. Korkarım ki önümüzdeki yıllarda bir tek İmparatorluk aşarları ile elzem dünyalarınız için asgari tedarik sunabileceğiz."
